title: Here a proff that xin zaho full ap is op
body: look at the video you will undestand

replies.body: Imagine what happens when some one stuns you because you're melee and you do all your damage in auto attacks because your E has a super long CD. We've all be wanting AP XZ to be a thing since S2 world's when they played 'What would AP Xin Zhao Do', but it's just not going to work. Too AA reliant as a melee.
You can do that with a fed ad xin zhao before towers scale as well.
notice that all the enemies were bots.

AP xin is so uuh.... really snowbally dependent to ever shine, that sucks 
by the time he reaches that turret facerolling point, most if not all but nexus turrets will already be down ;l

He's only got 1 ap scaling move and ... it's not bad damage but not amazing imo

I tried playing abuncha ap xin games but never got that to work out ;l
Gotta admit that is pretty strong, hopefully noone lets you get to that point cuz if they do its GG.
Imagine if you had {{item:3065}} ! Ha ha ha!
